# Conjugate Families {#sec-chap-005}





::::: {#obj-chap-005}
:::: {.my-objectives}
::: {.my-objectives-header}
Objectives
:::

::: {.my-objectives-container}

- Practice building Bayesian models. Build Bayesian models by practicing how to recognize kernels and make use of proportionality. 
- Familiarize yourself with conjugacy. Learn about what makes a prior conjugate and why this is a helpful property.

:::
::::
:::::
